overview: Mr. Iskra is Chief Operating Officer of Simplex Healthcare and has nearly two decades of domestic and international experience in the medical diagnostics industry. His broad experiences cover sales, marketing, business development, reimbursement, operations, business process improvement and general management. Mr. Iskra joins Simplex from CCS Medical where he served as Executive Vice President and General Manager of the Diabetes Division, and led an organization of more than 1,000 employees and served as a member of the Office of the President. Prior to joining CCS Medical Mr. Iskra served as Vice President of Marketing, Europe at Siemens Medical Solutions Diagnostic based in Dublin, Ireland . Mr. Iskra has held many other positions within the healthcare industry at Bayer Healthcare Diagnostics and PSS Inc. Mr. Iskra holds a BA in International Relations from the University of Delaware.
